00066     class Matrix : protected vector<double> {
00067      public:        
00069         Matrix(const string& inName="") : mRows(0), mCols(0), mPrec(15), mName(inName) {}
00070         
00072         explicit Matrix(unsigned int inRows, unsigned int inCols, const string& inName="") 
00073         : vector<double>(inRows*inCols, 0), mRows(inRows), mCols(inCols), mPrec(15), mName(inName) {}
00074         
00076         explicit Matrix(unsigned int inRows, unsigned int inCols, double inValue, const string& inName="") 
00077         : vector<double>(inRows*inCols, inValue), mRows(inRows), mCols(inCols), mPrec(15), mName(inName) {}
00078         
00080         virtual ~Matrix() {mRows = mCols = 0;}
00081         
00083         Matrix& operator=(const Matrix& inMatrix) {
00084             if(&inMatrix != this) {
00085                 // don't self assign!
00086                 vector<double>::operator=(inMatrix);
00087                 mRows = inMatrix.mRows; mCols = inMatrix.mCols;
00088                 if(mName == "") mName = inMatrix.mName;
00089             }
00090             return *this;
00091         }
00092         
00094         inline const double& operator()(unsigned int inRow, unsigned int inCol) const {
00095             PACC_AssertM(inRow < mRows && inCol < mCols, "Matrix::operator() invalid matrix indices!");
00096             return (*this)[(inRow*mCols)+inCol];
00097         }
00098         
00100         inline double& operator()(unsigned int inRow, unsigned int inCol) {
00101             PACC_AssertM(inRow < mRows && inCol < mCols, "Matrix::operator() invalid matrix indices!");
00102             return (*this)[(inRow*mCols)+inCol];
00103         }
00104         
00106         inline Matrix operator+(double inScalar) const {Matrix lMatrix; return add(lMatrix, inScalar);}
00107         
00109         inline Matrix& operator+=(double inScalar) {return add(*this, inScalar);}
00110         
00112         inline Matrix operator+(const Matrix& inMatrix) const {Matrix lMatrix; return add(lMatrix, inMatrix);}
00113         
00115         inline Matrix& operator+=(const Matrix& inMatrix) {return add(*this, inMatrix);}
00116         
00118         inline Matrix operator-(double inScalar) const {Matrix lMatrix; return subtract(lMatrix, inScalar);}
00119         
00121         inline Matrix& operator-=(double inScalar) {return subtract(*this, inScalar);}
00122         
00124         inline Matrix operator-(const Matrix& inMatrix) const {Matrix lMatrix; return subtract(lMatrix, inMatrix);}
00125         
00127         inline Matrix& operator-=(const Matrix& inMatrix) {return subtract(*this, inMatrix);}
00128         
00130         inline Matrix operator*(double inScalar) const {Matrix lMatrix; return multiply(lMatrix, inScalar);}
00131         
00133         inline Matrix& operator*=(double inScalar) {return multiply(*this, inScalar);}
00134         
00136         inline Matrix operator*(const Matrix& inMatrix) const {Matrix lMatrix; return multiply(lMatrix, inMatrix);}
00137         
00139         inline Matrix operator*=(const Matrix& inMatrix) {return multiply(*this, inMatrix);}
00140

00146

00289         inline void setRowsCols(unsigned int inRows, unsigned int inCols) {
00290             mRows = inRows; mCols = inCols;
00291             vector<double>::resize(mRows*mCols);
00292         }
